SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.services

Class AvatarFileService

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.services.AvatarFileService
public class AvatarFileService extends Object
Service class for handling avatar file operations such as storage, validation, retrieval, and deletion.

Supports MIME type validation, file size limits, and file system operations for user avatars. Uses Apache Tika for MIME type detection and Java NIO for file management.

  • Method Details

    • getAvatarStoragePath

      public static Path getAvatarStoragePath()
      Retrieves the configured storage path for avatar files from the system property 'avatar.storage.path'.
      Returns:
      The absolute, normalized path to the avatar storage directory.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the system property is not set or blank.

    • isValidMimeType

      public static boolean isValidMimeType(InputStream inputStream)
      Checks if the MIME type of the provided input stream is allowed for avatar uploads.
      Parameters:
      inputStream - The input stream of the file to check.
      Returns:
      true if the MIME type is allowed, false otherwise.

    • getFilename

      public static String getFilename(Long id, byte[] fileBytes)
      Generates a filename for the avatar based on user ID and detected MIME type.
      Parameters:
      id - The user ID.
      fileBytes - The byte array of the file to detect MIME type.
      Returns:
      The generated filename with appropriate extension, or ID with no extension if unsupported.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if MIME type detection fails.

    • saveFileWithSizeLimit

      public static boolean saveFileWithSizeLimit(InputStream inputStream, String filename)
      Saves a file to the avatar storage directory, enforcing a maximum file size limit.
      Parameters:
      inputStream - The input stream of the file to be saved.
      filename - The desired filename for the saved file.
      Returns:
      true if the file was saved successfully and within size limit, false otherwise.

    • resolveAvatarPath

      public static Path resolveAvatarPath(Long id)
      Resolves the avatar file path for a user by ID, checking all supported file extensions.
      Parameters:
      id - The user ID.
      Returns:
      The Path to the avatar file if found, or null if not found.

    • removeExistingFiles

      public static boolean removeExistingFiles(Long id)
      Removes all existing avatar files for a user by ID, across all supported extensions.
      Parameters:
      id - The user ID.
      Returns:
      true if all files were removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • getMimeType

      public static String getMimeType(Path filePath)
      Gets the MIME type of a file by its path using the system's file type detector.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file.
      Returns:
      The MIME type string, or null if not detected.

    • getMimeTypeForUser

      public static String getMimeTypeForUser(Long id)
      Gets the MIME type of a user's avatar file by user ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The user ID.
      Returns:
      The MIME type string, or null if not found.

    • getCacheData

      public static AvatarFileService.CacheData getCacheData(Path filePath) throws IOException
      Gets cache metadata for a file, including last modified time, size, and MIME type.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file.
      Returns:
      CacheData object with file metadata.
      Throws:
      IOException - if file attributes cannot be read.
